sentences.sContent: The bark was dressed with masthead flags only.
sentences.sContent_eng: The bark was dressed with masthead flags only.
sentences.sCn: 那条三桅帆船只用桅顶旗装饰。

sentences.sContent: This is where you would setup your company site masthead and navigation.
sentences.sContent_eng: This is where you would setup your company site masthead and navigation.
sentences.sCn: 可以在该框架中设置公司站点报头（masthead）和导航。

sentences.sContent: These are therefore sometimes called masthead sloops.
sentences.sContent_eng: These are therefore sometimes called masthead sloops.
sentences.sCn: 因此有时我们也把这类帆船叫做桅顶单桅帆(masthead sloops)。

trans.tranOther: the name of a newspaper, magazine etc printed in a special design at the top of the first page
